articles.author: Barry Gerding
articles.title: UBC Okanagan study to investigate where Eurasian watermilfoil occurs in lakes - Vernon Morning Star
articles.description: Milfoil was introduced into the Okanagan Valley lake system some 40 years ago
articles.content:
A UBC Okanagan pilot project is seeking to better pinpoint and map where the beginnings of Eurasian watermilfoil (EWM) infestation occurs in the large lakes within the Okanagan Valley watershed.

articles.title: 'It's been 3 long years': ZoukOut returns with a bang at Sentosa - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Dance music festival ZoukOut returned with a bang after a three-year hiatus at Siloso Beach on Sentosa. The first night of the two-day dusk-to-dawn festival on Friday (Dec 2) saw partygoers dancing along to a line-up of electronic dance music arti…

articles.title: Womankind podcast finds out: What causes burnout in women? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: On the fifth episode of CNA Women's Womankind podcast, hosts Hidayah Salamat and Penelope Chan talk to former corporate lawyer and co-founder of online counselling service Talk Your Heart Out, Shilpa Jain.
articles.content: Burnout disproportionately affects women across the world. Specifically, working mothers display more symptoms of occupational burnout including feeling overwhelmed and unaccomplished than working fa… [+262 chars]

articles.title: #trending: Customer claims AirAsia overbooked flight, forced family off plane 'like criminals' - TODAY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, MALAYSIA — An AirAsia customer recently shared on social media that she was left feeling helpless and in tears after her family was "forcibly chased off" an overbooked plane at the Kuala Lumpur International Airport 2.
